{{cpp/chrono/weekday_last/title|1=weekday}}
{{cpp/chrono/weekday_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr std::chrono::weekday weekday() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Retrieves a copy of the {{lc|std::chrono::weekday}} object stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
A copy of the {{lc|std::chrono::weekday}} object stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
using namespace std::chrono;
 
int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    auto wdl{Tuesday[last]}; // Last Tuesday of a month
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (year_month_day{wdl/10/2019} ==
                  year_month_day{October/29/2019}) &lt;&lt; ' ';

    wdl = {(wdl.weekday() + days(2))[last]}; // Last Tuesday is now last Thursday
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (year_month_day{wdl/10/2019} ==
                  year_month_day{October/31/2019}) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true true
}}
